ClaimTeamMember.name: ClaimTeamMember
ClaimTeamMember.description: Represents a user who is a part of the claim team.

ClaimId.description: The claim associated with the claim team member.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the claim team member record.

Role.description: The role of the claim team member.

UserId.description: The user associated with the claim as a claim team member.
